caption.title: The range of the physiological tolerances of Pseudolarix amabilis
caption.p: Bio4: temperature seasonality (A), Bio6: min temperature of coldest month (°C) (B), Bio9: mean temperature of driest quarter (°C) (C), Bio12: annual precipitation (mm) (D), Bio14: precipitation of driest month (mm) (E).
